description:
Prince Harry scrapped a secret trip to Canada to meet with Meghan Markle after details of their alleged six-month relationship emerged.在媒体曝出哈里王子和梅格汉·马克尔相恋六个月的消息之后，哈里王子取消了去加拿大约见梅格汉的秘密之旅。

Prince Harry was booked on to a British Airways flight from Heathrow to Toronto at 11.30am and due to land in the Canadian city at 3.30pm on Sunday but was a 'no show', a source said.据有关消息透露，哈里王子从英国航空公司预订了上午11:30从希思罗机场飞往多伦多的航班，该航班于星期天下午3:30抵达加拿大的这座城市，但是哈里王子并没有“现身”。

Hours before he cancelled the trip to Toronto, it was revealed their “relationship” broke.有消息称哈利王子和梅格汉分手了，几个小时之后，哈里王子就取消了前往多伦多的行程。

The 35-year-old actress, Meghan Markle, who is best known for her role as Rachel Zane in US legal drama Suits, is believed to have charmed Prince Harry when he visited Toronto in May.据称，哈里王子5月份访问多伦多的时候被梅格汉·马克尔迷住了。这位35岁的女演员最知名的角色是在美国律政剧《金装律师》中饰演的瑞秋·赞恩。

As claims the pair were 'besotted' with each other emerged, keen observers spotted pictures of them wearing matching bracelets and it's possible he gave a similar to trinket to Meghan as a gift.当这对佳人爱的“如痴如醉”的消息冒出来的时候，敏锐的观察者们发现他们戴着同款手链，而这条同款饰品很有可能是哈里王子送给梅格汉的礼物。

The prince, 32, also follows the actress on the picture sharing website Instagram using a pseudonym, the Mail can reveal.据《每日邮报》报道，32岁的哈里王子用笔名关注了这位女演员Instagram上分享的照片。

Intriguingly, Harry, who publicly professes to hate social media, is one of her million followers and she also follows him.有趣的是，哈里王子曾公开表示不喜欢社交媒体，但他却是梅格汉无数粉丝中的一个，而且梅格汉也关注了他。

The revelation is telling because the prince has a private account and only 'follows' a few close friends and charities, suggesting the pair know each other fairly well.这个发现告诉我们，哈里王子有一个私人账户，他只“关注”几个亲近的朋友和慈善机构，这也说明这两个人彼此非常了解。

According to reports, she has dined with Harry when in London and has met his friends. She stayed with him at Kensington Palace and met the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge, according to the Express.据报道，梅格汉在伦敦的时候与哈里王子一起用过餐，而且她还见过哈里王子的朋友。据《每日快报》报道，梅格汉和哈里王子一起在肯辛顿宫呆过，而且她还会见了剑桥公爵夫妇。

'William and Kate really liked her and she fitted in straight away,' the source added. 'Meghan is a very confident and intelligent woman and she's not overawed mixing with royalty.’“威廉王子和凯特王妃非常喜欢她，而且她很快就融入其中，”该报道补充道。“梅格汉是一个非常聪明自信的女人，与皇室成员相处，她也不会怯场。”

But Meghan has also been linked with Northern Irish golfer Rory McIlroy and Canadian star chef Cory Vitiello, who she was apparently romantically linked to when she met Harry.不过，梅格汉和北爱尔兰高尔夫球手罗里·麦克罗伊以及加拿大明星主厨科里·维迪耶罗传过绯闻。显然，在她遇到哈里王子的时候，她跟科里·维迪耶罗依然关系暧昧。

In March Mr Vitiello was boasting on Twitter that he was 'so proud of my lady' after she was named a global ambassador for the children's charity World Vision.3月份，梅格汉被提名为儿童慈善机构世界展望会的全球大使，之后维迪耶罗先生就在推特上发文称，我“为我的女人感到骄傲”。

To date, Meghan's romantic life has been low profile. When asked where Meghan wants to travel to next, she replied: 'Scotland.'迄今为止，梅格汉的感情生活一直很低调。当被问及下一步想去哪儿旅行的时候，她的回答是“苏格兰”。

title: 哈里王子恋上《金装律师》女演员 或已分手?!
